entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers and flurries this morning and ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11.
